html:
8.16.17  1:29 am   Given the state of the human race, do you consider yourself a cynical person 

     i don't really know what 'cynical' means, but i have heard bad things about it

8.16.17  1:22 am   what should I do to surprise others?

     change the world

8.16.17  1:12 am   Why does the planet have colors?

     why would it not

8.16.17  12:19 am   how was the experience of creating a website?

     very nice

     do you recommend artists make their own websites to catalog their creations?

     oh hell yeah

8.15.17  11:51 pm   on 3.23.17 2:02 am, you finally used the shift key to make capital letters. I've never been more proud.

     what do you mean 'finally?' i have used capital letters thousands of times before and after that date. i think i use them every day actually. in fact, there are 3 right on the "ASK" button of this page

8.15.17  11:15 pm   Do you think you're ever going to make some sort of podcast? I know you probably won't but it'd be really fun to have you do a podcast of some sort 

     i'm not exactly sure on what counts as a podcast and what does not. but if i do something that counts as a podcast (or perhaps i even already have) i don't think i would prefer to call it a podcast. the word podcast has always confused me

8.15.17  11:03 pm   what will you do when you are confused ?

     try to figure things out

8.15.17  10:10 pm   Have you ever considered making a musical score for all of the reality videos you post?

     i think i probably thought that was a good idea many years ago, and probably got thrown into the mix of all the different kinds of things i *could* do, or should probably do. why not underscore my entire life and make every moment of my life into a high quality movie? sounds wonderful, but just like most of the aspirations i've had, that line of thinking only works in forever land

8.15.17  9:18 pm   How do I make reality less boring? How does one determine how entertaining completing a wierd act will be for the said individual?

     you'll have to try it and see

     Is there a scale or chart to calculate this?

     just try it and see what it's like

     Is there a way to make more exciting things happen in your life?

     just try experimenting and doing things a little differently. you never know what you might discover

8.15.17  9:16 pm   I just realized that typing without capitals or proper punctuation is wayyyyyy faster than writing with it

     ah, that's true

8.15.17  9:15 pm   do you ever just need to get something/an idea out, but it goes away before you can write/type/record it?? it's frustrating

     i have gotten very good at catching ideas when they arrive. i have some solid techniques in place

8.15.17  9:02 pm   Are you going to do monday videos again?

     maybe, but i think it's more important to focus on some of the things i have not done enough of yet

8.15.17  7:26 pm   Can you explain the entire history of the world?

     i already made my best attempt, in 2016/17

8.15.17  7:08 pm   What are some of the pros and cons of being a human person?

     we are awesome but not as awesome as we could be, yet

8.15.17  6:33 pm   how do you express yourself other than music/videos?

     sometimes by writing text

8.15.17  5:39 pm   what is your opinions on hyphens? for example 're-sort' vs. 'resort' or 'factory-produced' vs. 'factory produced'

     they can be useful

8.15.17  5:37 pm   do any of your songs come from a non fictional standpoint?

     yes

8.15.17  5:36 pm   is "alphabet shuffle" supposed to be a sequel to "abcdefghijk"

     no

      or is it just me that thinks that?

8.15.17  3:12 pm   are you a cute anime girl

     i will check

8.15.17  3:08 pm   what do you call a series of chords like 2m-5-1 if not a chord progression?

     chords

8.15.17  2:34 pm   what is the time shown aside the question? the time it is asked or answered?

     asked

8.15.17  2:08 pm   i've played piano for several years and have studying singing for more than a year, but in the end all i feel is so tired that almost broken down. i almost cannot remember how i'm deeply touched by music. i don't think there's anything wrong with music. i just wonder if i learned it the wrong way or what. do i not practice enough or not listen carefully enough? how do i find a way to start over?

     if you don't enjoy it then you don't have to do it

8.15.17  1:11 pm   Do you think we'll find a form of life that isn't carbon based at some point?

     i think so

8.15.17  12:40 pm   Why don't you like to be called "Mr.Wurtz"?

     

     
Also is it OK if I ask the same question multiple times or would that annoy you? (Second time asking)

8.15.17  12:35 pm   Hey i just realised all this time i thought the chords and the melody were the same thing. But since they are different, what exactly are chords and how they function and what makes them support the melody? When i listen to songs i'm starting to pay attention to the instruments and the chords they're playing, but it rarely makes sense to me how they are connected to the melody of the song. This might not be a good question. But i'm just so confused. As a 'songwriter' i'm mostly focused on the vocal melody and lyrics as a result, but i'd like to understand better.

     if you sing a song, the part you sing is the melody. it's one note at a time. the chords are all the other groups of notes that play simultaneously while the melody is happening

8.15.17  12:13 pm   I think your style of musical surrealistic humour would make an awesome fit for cartoons or something along those lines. Have you, or will you ever considered lending your style to those kinds of projects?

     sure, especially if i was the one making the project

8.15.17  12:08 pm   everyone my age is boring what do i do

     be boring too. or, for a twist, be non-boring

8.15.17  12:07 pm   Have you ever noticed that most (if not all) cartoon characters wear the same outfit every single day? Do you think that's a good strategy for how to dress in real life? (Not the exact same clothes everyday cause you'd start to smell bad, but just have mutiple sets of the same outfit).

     i think that can be a recipe for success. you don't have to waste any time thinking about what to wear. on the other hand, if your career happens to be based on wardrobe variety, then that's a bad example but there would be other things in your life that you could nail down to an exact routine, and the same thing is true

8.15.17  11:50 am   Hi Bill! I'm a big fan of your music. I'm wondering if after all of these years of playing and writing music, do you think you're still getting better and learning new things?

     oh hell yeah

     Any specific new 'tricks' or techniques that you've figured out recently?

     one thing that has been very difficult for me, but i have gradually begun to learn, is how to write backwards -- like how to write a section that goes BEFORE something you've already written. like if you have the chorus, but you don't know the verse. this took me a long time to learn. but i seem to have gradually learned how to do it, and i did it with both of my most recent songs

8.15.17  11:04 am   if an eccentric billionaire were to propose funding you entirely (living expenses, studio, instruments, really anything you could possibly need) completely no strings attached (this eccentric billionaire just wants to hear/see more content from you) would you agree or would you decline in favor of doing your own thing like you've been doing?

     why wouldn't i be able to do my own thing if i agreed? i thought you said if i agreed there were no strings attached and i could do my own thing?

8.15.17  11:02 am   i have too many things to do but i only have 24 hours a day? time is cruel. how can i deal with this?

     do some things on a different day

8.15.17  10:32 am   What makes things secondary projects to you? Is it just that you want to do them, but not as much as your main projects? Or is it based on what you know the majority of your fans want to see? Perhaps a balance therein?

     here's an example: the movie "Frozen" ... and Behind The Scenes In The Animating Studio While Making Frozen. i would consider the movie to be the primary project, and the behind the scenes to be the secondeary project

8.15.17  10:16 am   does maintenance and adventure mutually exclusive?

     no

     do we have a choice?

     yes

     how to choose between these two?

     you don't have to

     which one is more important? 

     they are both nice

8.15.17  8:27 am   On the random question page, could you put the "random question" button on top of the question instead of under it? That way I could just keep clicking it without having to move my mouse because right now it moves when questions are longer/shorter and it's not a good use of my time. Thanks!

     ok i made a different version just for you. this one doesn't seem as friendly for the mobile version, because your thumb gets in the way of the questions

8.15.17  6:44 am   what are your thoughts on the moon?

     it is nice

8.15.17  6:31 am   how many stars out of five do you rate planet earth? i give it 2.5/5 because hoverboards don't exist here.

     it's the only one that we can currently live on. so i think the scale really only goes from 1 to 1, in which case i give it a 1

8.15.17  5:48 am   Do you think we're all secretly lizards?

     i'm not sure. but i'm not

8.15.17  3:19 am   will you be uploading any notes from 2006, or do you not have any? was it an insignificant year, or one you'd rather not remember?

     stolen

8.15.17  2:53 am   Where can you find true art

     anywhere

8.15.17  2:24 am   how do i learn music theory?

     make up your own!

8.15.17  1:38 am   is being normal bad?

     no

8.15.17  1:30 am   will you sometimes copy your previous answers as answer of the question that is being answered ?

     yes, if the question is the same

8.15.17  1:04 am   im on acid right now and i dont think you will answer the question

     what question

8.15.17  12:27 am   do the ladies know that it's all about the ladies?

     i think so

8.15.17  12:07 am   Why you didn't answered any question yesterday (8.14.17)? 

     i did, but i respect your opinion

8.15.17  12:03 am   bill, you havent answered a question all day. why is that?

     i have, but i respect your opinion

8.14.17  11:55 pm   Why do you hate capital letters?

     i do not

8.14.17  10:38 pm   did you know that "a well-developed mathematical framework that is general enough to account for the extremely large variety of biological phenomena is still missing"?

     yes

8.14.17  9:29 pm   do volcanoes erupt magic?

     sort of

8.14.17  9:28 pm   why are you sometimes not sure if your answers answer peoples questions?

     why are you not sure why i'm not sure
